No. Financst provides end-of-day (T-1) data. We focus on fundamental analysis and historical trends rather than instant day-trading fluctuations.

q3.question: Can I buy or sell stocks on Financst?

answer.part1: No, Financst is an analysis and portfolio tracking tool. We are not a brokerage firm, so actual trading must be done through your preferred broker.

q4.question: How do I add stocks to my Watchlist?

answer.part1: Navigate to any stock's detail page using the search bar. Click the 'Add to Watchlist' button in the header. You need to be logged in to use this feature.

aboutUs.title: About Financst
aboutUs.intro: In the fast-moving world of finance, clarity is everything. Financst replaces cluttered notebooks and complicated spreadsheets with a modern, streamlined experience so that your portfolio always stays accessible, organized, and clear.

empowering.title: Empowering Your Financial Journey
empowering.desc: Whether you track stocks, cryptocurrency, or foreign exchange, Financst gives you the confidence to stay on top of the markets. We emphasize usability and transparency so you can make informed decisions without digging through raw spreadsheets.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.personalizedDesc: curate a bespoke list of financial instruments that matter to you and keep your dashboard focused.
whatWeDo.clarityDesc: translate portfolio data into intuitive charts that spotlight trends and performance at a glance.
whatWeDo.securityDesc: track investments in a private environment where your data stays isolated and protected.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: We are committed to democratizing professional-grade portfolio management. By removing technical barriers and focusing on a user-centric design, we help investors spend less time on data entry and more time acting on market opportunities. Manage your portfolio anytime, anywhere with Financst.
